input_text:
Job Title: Service & Parts Advisor (Marine)

Location: Newport, RI

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Job Description

Service & Parts Advisor (Marine)

£26,000 - £30,000 + Training + Progression + Company Benefits

Newport - Isle of Wight

Are you a service or parts advisor with a background or familiarity with the marine industry looking for a stable, permanent position within a highly accomplished marine dealership, who are known for looking after their staff and providing progress over time?

On offer is the opportunity to join a very busy privately owned marine engineering company, who are going through an exciting period of growth and are looking for the right candidate to help continue their success. You will be working within a tight-knit team, assisting in the supply of parts and services to both customers and the workshop.

This role would suit a technically minded individual to support a busy marine engineering workshop and boatyard.

The Role

Providing technical parts support to customers, trades people and colleaguesScheduling workshop jobsAssisting with logistics surrounding works, such as haul outs, mobile working and liaising with other boatyard colleaguesEnsuring colleagues have support and parts they need to complete jobsMonitoring parts and stock levels for an efficient workshopOrganisation and cleanliness of workshop and parts areasSome weekend work (Peak Season)

The Person

Parts Advisor or similarMarine or Automotive backgroundFull UK Drivers Licence

Reference: BBBH12917A

Keywords: Service, Advisor, Parts Advisor, Parts, Automotive, Marine, Garage, Mechanic, Customer Service, Sales, Aftersales,

If you're interested in this role, click 'apply now' to forward an up-to-date copy of your CV.

We are an equal opportunities employer and welcome applications from all suitable candidates. The salary advertised is a guideline for this position. The offered renumeration will be dependent on the extent of your experience, qualifications, and skill set.

Ernest Gordon Recruitment Limited acts as an employment agency for permanent recruitment and employment business for the supply of temporary workers. By applying for this job, you accept the T&C's, Privacy Policy and Disclaimers which can be found at our website.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Service & Parts Advisor (Marine)
output_json.summary: Join a busy marine engineering company for a stable, permanent position as a Service & Parts Advisor.
job_responsibilities: Providing technical parts support to customers, tradespeople, and colleagues
Assisting with logistics surrounding works, such as haul-outs, mobile working, and liaising with other boatyard colleagues
Ensuring colleagues have support and parts they need to complete jobs
Monitoring parts and stock levels for an efficient workshop
Organization and cleanliness of workshop and parts areas
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: We are an equal opportunities employer and welcome applications from all suitable candidates.
